name: Lamia
description: A Lamia has the upper body of a beautiful humanoid woman and the lower body of a lion or serpentine form, exuding a chaotic and evil aura.
memorable: Known for using charm magic and illusions to deceive and manipulate victims.
goals: To lure travelers into traps and drain their life force.
relations: Often serves dark gods or demonic powers.
environment: Typically found in deserts or ancient ruins.
strengths: Possesses strong spellcasting abilities and effective in manipulation.
weaknesses: Relatively vulnerable to sustained attacks due to average Armor Class.
attacks: Utilizes claws for slashing and a dagger attack that can deal piercing damage with poison effects.
most_powerful_ability: Hypnotic Pattern, which incapacitates multiple foes within its area of effect.
senses: Has a passive Perception score of 15, enabling it to detect hidden creatures effectively.
skills: Skilled in Deception, Insight, and Stealth, allowing for effective manipulation and sneaky maneuvers.
additional_information: Possesses the ability to traverse difficult terrains without leaving traces.
Resistant to exhaustion and frightened conditions.
Can teleport short distances using Misty Step.
Can charm targets with Intoxicating Gaze, reducing their ability to resist.
Can create powerful illusions to deceive foes.
spellcasting: Innate spellcasting focused on charm and illusion spells, including *disguise self* and *major image*.
test_queries: charming monster that drains life force
